p: Trial was conducted on 250 patients of gouty arthritis between 20 and 80 years age divided into 2 groups as control and test group of 125 patients each (n = 125) for 18 weeks irrespective of socioeconomic status ( Figure 1). Patients aged 20 to 80 years with symptomatic gouty arthritis, medical history of gouty arthritis without any other presenting complains or associated disorders and serum uric acid >8 mg/dl were included in the study while grouty arthritis patients with other associated disorders were excluded from the study. Control group patients were treated with allopurinol (300 mg tablet) while test group patients were given Urinile (300 mg Tablet) twice a day for a period of 18 weeks.
